long_description: An advanced binding for skiers weighing 92 - 264 lbs., the Salomon STH 12 Driver downhill ski bindings are built for high speed and fast turns on any terrain. Long, automatically adjusting toe wings increase contact zone with boots for precise boot hold and enhanced energy transmission to edges. The Salomon STH 12 Driver downhill ski bindings feature a low stand height for increased terrain feedback and enhanced power transmission. Metallic reinforcements at toes and heels significantly increase bindings' durability for aggressive skiing on and off piste. Stomp Pedal antifriction device uses fewer moving parts than standard designs, increasing durability and maintaining reliable release. Choose from 90, 100 and 115mm brake widths; 4 - 12 DIN range provides assertive skiers with the performance they demand.
